headline: Berkshire Trims Citigroup Inc. (C) and Other Financial Holdings
summary: Berkshire Hathaway‘s most recent 13-F filing shows a strategic shift in its investment portfolio. The firm doubled its position in Constellation Brands—the US distributor of Modelo and Corona beers—while completely exiting its $1 billion stake in Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C), a holding it had maintained for three years. Moreover, Berkshire reduced its exposure to other financial […]
